attributes.additional_details:
StOP THE BADGER CULL NOW!.

1) The scheme will not work, unless the goverments intends to make the Badger exstinct in this country

2) It makes no sesen why the Goverments ignores the results of its own 10 year research, which concluded against any culling of the Badger

3)  That the actual TB putbreak problem arises from transportation of infected Bovines and farms,

4) that Bovine health inspection is too infrequent and pre announced. Inspection periods should at least be doubled and un announced

5) Inoculation of Bovine should be implemented implemented with part of the costs to be carried by the big supermarket chains operating in the UK.,

(The big Supermarket Chains are in part to blame for ill managed dairy farms , as their aggressive price negotiations have left many farmers out of pocket.)

STOP THE BADGER CULL NOW!!
